author: jsdelfino
msg: Handle cases where the HTTP get url does not end with a /, redirect to a url with a / to make relative hrefs work in HTML.

author: etnu
msg: Continued refactoring GadgetServer configuration by exposing a read-only view of configuration data and allowing classes to get access to the GadgetServer's configuration at run time so that they don't have to pass parallel copies of shared objects around.

author: djencks
msg: make the demo servers smaller by starting with boilerplate, not framework

msg: make sure to fail on any exception or error (GERONIMO-3767)
